lore: §7Scarf is the boss of Floor 2 of the Catacombs.
§7He is a 'Apprentice Necromancer and has two
§7phases. In the first phase he summons 4 undead survents
§7while he hides behind a barrier. Once all 4 are
§7defeated, the barrier comes down and you must kill him in the 2nd phase
